tweets.text: With the expert help of @acornsandnuts, the @ELGL50 #ELGLStrategicPlan process continues! Last week the board did a SOAR exercise and this week we're asking questions on social media to crowdsource responses from our #localgov friends. Today's question: https://t.co/k7tv1d2Wts
